title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From SIEM to SOC: Building AI-Native Security in the Cloud with AWS (AIM289)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从 SIEM 到 SOC：使用 AWS 在云中构建 AI 原生安全 (AIM289)
abstract: According to the CrowdStrike 2025 Threat Hunting Report, cloud intrusions surged 136% in the first half of 2025 (compared to all of 2024) and adversaries are rapidly sharpening their tactics in the cloud, making visibility into cloud events a non-negotiable for security teams. With Falcon Next-Gen SIEM and Falcon Cloud Security, you can quickly onboard essential data from AWS CloudTrail, Security Hub, and Guard Duty with a single click to detect and respond to cloud threats at speed. Join this session to discover how AWS and CrowdStrike are revolutionizing defenses with AI, leveling the playing field for SOC teams against today's sophisticated threats. This presentation is brought to you by CrowdStrike, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 根据CrowdStrike 2025年威胁狩猎报告，2025年上半年云入侵激增136%（与2024年全年相比），攻击者正在迅速提升其云端攻击策略，使得云事件可见性成为安全团队的必备要素。借助Falcon Next-Gen SIEM和Falcon Cloud Security，您可以通过单击操作快速接入来自AWS CloudTrail、Security Hub和Guard Duty的关键数据，以快速检测和响应云威胁。加入本次会议，了解AWS和CrowdStrike如何利用AI革新防御体系，为SOC团队在应对当今复杂威胁时创造公平竞争环境。本演示由AWS合作伙伴CrowdStrike提供。
